thread.title: Ashie Williams
thread.title_full: Babyonlinedress 的点评人 Ashie Williams

author: Ashie Williams
title: Ashie Williams
text: Horrible experience i got a dress that looked nothing like the one i purchased the dress came snagged horrible stitching i could cry right this was for my engagement shoot please whatever u do don't take no chances with these people and I made a review and they only allow good reviews to be posted they denied my review
